query:
INSERT INTO restaurants (tripId, name, address, cuisineType, reservationDate, reservationTime, numberOfDiners, phone, website, price, currency, paymentStatus, notes, coverImage, linkedDocumentId, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 2 as tripId, name, address, cuisineType, reservationDate, reservationTime, numberOfDiners, phone, website, price, currency, paymentStatus, notes, coverImage, linkedDocumentId, NOW() as createdAt, NOW() as updatedAt
FROM restaurants
WHERE tripId = 1;

INSERT INTO payments (tripId, category, description, amount, currency, dueDate, status, notes, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 2 as tripId, category, description, amount, currency, dueDate, status, notes, NOW() as createdAt, NOW() as updatedAt
FROM payments
WHERE tripId = 1;
